text:
There is an <https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/manual/methods/#Tuple-and-NTuple-arguments|example in the documentation> that looks like:

```f(x::Tuple{}) = 3```
I know about parameterized types but I don’t understand what an empty pair of braces means. Is `Tuple{}` the same as just `Tuple`? Or is it shorthand for something else?

Edit: based on a few examples I ran, it seems like an empty tuple. Is that true?
